str2: In like manner, similarly, in the same way, equally. Adverb from homoios; similarly.
From Leui; a Levite, i.e. Descendant of Levi.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular

str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

word: he passed by on the other side.
parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pass opposite, on the opposite side of the road. From anti and parerchomai; to go along opposite.
